page.title: 12COMING TO SCHOOL IN MORETON
page.content: I live in Ongar, but I come to school in Moreton because I use to live here. I like coming to school in Moreton because on the way I can smell 2 miles of corn, barley and rape. On the way I see cows and sheep grazing in the meadow. Sometimes I see horses running in the fields. As we drive down the road from Ongar I notice that the roads are getting narrower because we are getting near the village. There are not so many houses in Moreton as there are in Ongar. Moreton is very colourful, but Ongar has not got so many fields so it is not so colourful.
